backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Rose Day features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend files in the Rose Day experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal root component that renders the RoseDayExperience.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFrame: Provides the global layout with background image, gradient overlay, header, and footer wrapping all scenes.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/RoseDayExp: State machine driving landing, prompt, building, and finale phases with rose-count logic and 3D scene rendering.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/scenes/Bui: Bottom overlay UI showing bouquet progress, rose count, and an Add Rose button during the building phase.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/scenes/Fin: Centered finale card displaying the completed bouquet message, rose total, and restart option.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/scenes/Lan: Intro card with Rose Day greeting, brief narrative, and a start button.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/scenes/Pro: Narrative transition card explaining the upcoming bouquet-building interaction and prompting continuation.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/three/bouq: Generates positions, rotations, and scale for roses in a spiral layered bouquet layout using constants.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/three/Bouq: React Three Fiber scene with camera, controls, lights, vase model, and animated roses positioned via bouquet layout.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/three/cons: Holds bouquet and animation constants like vase radius, layer spacing, tilt, and spawn offsets.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/three/Rose: Animated 3D rose component using react-three-fiber with entrance and floating effects plus detailed petal, stem, and leaf geometry.
frontend/src/features/roseDay/three/Vase: Defines a simple 3D vase composed of cylinder-based meshes with materials for body, rim, and base.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity management, and an authentication context using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Base Tailwind styles and custom Rose Day themed color variables plus typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors from CSS variables, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, required images, and a list of implemented features for an interactive Rose Day website with a 3D bouquet-building flow. Includes metadata, existing features, and begins listing new feature requests.
